casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Andre JHONSON. No. 589P99-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 2, 2004. Andre Jhonson, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Thomas H. Lock, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 13th day of October 2004 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Johnston County:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 2nd day of December 2004."
